task:
Using a kidney Xenium dataset that contains only day 2 PT cells with per-cell spatial centroids (x, y), cluster the cells into 5 subclusters and assign labels using the exact vocabulary: PTS1, PTS2, PTS3, Inj_PT, FR_PT. Use the following marker genes to guide labeling (higher expression in the indicated subtype vs others):

PTS1: Slc5a12
PTS2: Cyp2e1
PTS3: Slc7a13
FR_PT: Havcr1
Inj_PT: Vcam1, il34, Cd44

Then report the distribution of these PT subtypes as percentages of total PT cells. Percentages should sum to ~100%. Include any missing subtypes with 0%.

Vocabulary: PTS1, PTS2, PTS3, Inj_PT, FR_PT
